name: Untitled Gardening Game
description:
Submission to SuNoFes 2021!

Originally, I had intended to write a game about a haunted flatshare. I still will write that game, but after going through VegetarianZombie's twine tutorials I wanted to consolidate my knowledge. A 1-week test turned into a 2-month maze. But now I know the hell out of macros, variables, and formatting.

There are places where I had to acknowledge that I didn't have the time or energy to make it as complex as I wanted. If you enjoyed the game, let me know, and I will be motivated to make those expansions!
